code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const labels={home:{es:'Inicio',en:'Home'},manifesto:{es:'Manifiesto',en:'Manifesto'},podcast:{es:'Podcast',en:'Podcast'},ideas:{es:'El Pensadero',en:'The Thinkery'},contact:{es:'Contacto',en:'Contact'}};export default function LayoutHeader({language,onLanguageChange,onSectionClick}){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"bg-[#0A0A0A] text-white px-6 py-4 flex flex-wrap justify-between items-center shadow-md fixed top-0 w-full z-50",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"font-bold text-xl cta-highlight text-center",style:{letterSpacing:'1px'},children:"TheShakhestudium"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"flex flex-wrap gap-4",children:Object.keys(labels).map(section=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onSectionClick(section),className:"hover:underline",children:labels[section][language]},section))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"ml-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onLanguageChange('es'),className:language==='es'?'font-bold underline':'',children:"ES"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"mx-1",children:"|"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onLanguageChange('en'),className:language==='en'?'font-bold underline':'',children:"EN"})]})]});}
